# =============================================================================
# uSipipo VPN Manager - Environment Configuration Template
# =============================================================================
# IMPORTANT: Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# This file will be auto-generated by docker.sh during installation
# =============================================================================

# Telegram Bot Configuration
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Get your bot token from @BotFather on Telegram
TELEGRAM_TOKEN=your_telegram_bot_token_here

# Comma-separated list of authorized Telegram user IDs
# Get your ID by messaging @userinfobot on Telegram
AUTHORIZED_USERS=123456789,987654321

# Server Network Configuration
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Public IPv4 address (auto-detected during installation)
SERVER_IPV4=

# Public IPv6 address (optional, auto-detected if available)
SERVER_IPV6=

# Primary server IP (defaults to IPv4, falls back to IPv6)
SERVER_IP=

# Pi-hole Configuration
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Random port for Pi-hole web interface (auto-generated: 10000-59999)
PIHOLE_WEB_PORT=

# Pi-hole admin password (auto-generated: 12 characters)
PIHOLE_WEBPASS=

# Pi-hole DNS port (default: 53, modify if needed)
PIHOLE_DNS=53

# WireGuard Configuration
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Random UDP port for WireGuard (auto-generated: 10000-59999)
WIREGUARD_PORT=

# WireGuard server public key (auto-extracted from container)
WIREGUARD_PUBLIC_KEY=

# WireGuard endpoint (SERVER_IP:WIREGUARD_PORT)
WIREGUARD_ENDPOINT=

# Path to WireGuard configuration directory
WIREGUARD_PATH=/config

# Outline VPN Configuration
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Outline Management API URL (auto-generated with secret)
OUTLINE_API_URL=

# Outline API secret ID (auto-extracted from shadowbox config)
OUTLINE_API_SECRET=

# Random port for Outline API (auto-generated: 10000-59999)
OUTLINE_API_PORT=

# Certificate Management
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# SHA256 fingerprint of Outline SSL certificate (auto-extracted)
OUTLINE_CERT_SHA256=

# Preserve certificates on container restart (recommended: true)
PRESERVE_CERTS=true

# =============================================================================
# End of Configuration
# =============================================================================
